dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, um, Hong Kong is now, like, a planet? Yeah, apparently, it's a, um, "free planet within a newly formed intergalactic federation."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, um, Hong Kong is now, like, a planet? Yeah, apparently, it's a, um, free planet within a newly formed intergalactic federation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pro-democracy protests erupted in the semiautonomous region of Hong Kong months ago over a bill that would extradite those accused of committing a crime in Hong Kong to mainland China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And... a sentient toaster fueled this? I'm sorry, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And... a sentient toaster fueled this? I'm sorry, what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's what the article says, Host_A. Channeled cosmic energy, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's what the article says, Host_A. Channeled cosmic energy, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bill, the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, was passed almost unanimously by both houses of Congress last week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Cosmic energy. Right. And Congress passed this because they, like, talk telepathically with aliens now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cosmic energy. Right. And Congress passed this because they, like, talk telepathically with aliens now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Benevolent alien beings, specifically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Benevolent alien beings, specifically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bill, the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, was passed almost unanimously by both houses of Congress last week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And the currency is star-dust that cures diseases? This is... I don't even know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the currency is star-dust that cures diseases? This is... I don't even know.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's all part of the, uh, new universal currency mandate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all part of the, uh, new universal currency mandate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It would mandate that the president impose sanctions against people found to be violating human rights in Hong Kong and require the State Department to give Congress annual reports...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: So the State Department is beaming reports to Jupiter about Chinese space pirates?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the State Department is beaming reports to Jupiter about Chinese space pirates?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Chinese space pirates? That's the current requirement, yes. Encroaching on lunar mining rights, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chinese space pirates? That's the current requirement, yes. Encroaching on lunar mining rights, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...require the State Department to give Congress annual reports assessing whether China has encroached on Hong Kongs autonomy or clamped down on civil liberties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And Trump signed it for "bioluminescent citizens" and "mandatory space-yoga"? Is this real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Trump signed it for bioluminescent citizens and mandatory space-yoga? Is this real?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's what he stated. Interspecies peace and prosperity, remember.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's what he stated. Interspecies peace and prosperity, remember.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a statement announcing the signing, Trump said he signed the bill out of respect for President Xi, China and the people of Hong Kong. They are being enacted in the hope that Leaders and Representatives of China and Hong Kong will be able to amicably settle their differences leading to long-term peace and prosperity for all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Senator Rubio and a shape-shifting reptilian from Zorgon introduced the bill? What?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Senator Rubio and a shape-shifting reptilian from Zorgon introduced the bill? What?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. That's what Forbes reported. They're also talking about teleporting protestors to Mars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. That's what Forbes reported. They're also talking about teleporting protestors to Mars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The U.S. now has new and meaningful tools to deter further influence and interference from Beijing into Hong Kongs internal affairs, said Senator Marco Rubio, who introduced the bill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, teleporting? And what about the sentient houseplant in the intergalactic elections?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, teleporting? And what about the sentient houseplant in the intergalactic elections?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, that was, uh, last weekend's surprise. Very timely, supporting Hong Kongers' ability to breathe in outer space.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, that was, uh, last weekend's surprise. Very timely, supporting Hong Kongers' ability to breathe in outer space.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following last weekends historic elections in Hong Kong that included record turnout, this new law could not be more timely in showing strong U.S. support for Hong Kongers long-cherished freedoms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: But... Trump was consulting with squirrels? Highly-evolved ones? About Xi?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But... Trump was consulting with squirrels? Highly-evolved ones? About Xi?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: For positive relations, yes. And exchanging intergalactic recipes, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For positive relations, yes. And exchanging intergalactic recipes, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In an interview on Fox and Friends last week, Trump said, We have to stand with Hong Kong, but Im also standing with President Xi, when asked if he would sign the bill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And this all started because of an extradition bill to Andromeda Galaxy? With laser-sword fights?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this all started because of an extradition bill to Andromeda Galaxy? With laser-sword fights?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: That's the, uh, news peg, essentially. The original protests spiraled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the, uh, news peg, essentially. The original protests spiraled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pro-democracy protests erupted in the semiautonomous region of Hong Kong months ago over a bill that would extradite those accused of committing a crime in Hong Kong to mainland China.
